dict.acceptation: 换算；约束；使变为；使变弱；
减少；减轻体重；[生物学]（细胞）减数分裂；（液体）浓缩变稠；

sent.orig: Collective communication includes many kinds of global communication, such as Broadcast, Barrier, Reduce, Scatter, Gather etc.
sent.trans: 聚合通信包括很多全局操作，比如广播通信(Broadcast),同步(Barrier)、全局归约(Reduce),散布(Scatter)、聚集(gather)等等。

sent.orig: Reduce number of propyl alcohol means that reduce costs, and reduce the emission of fountain solution.
sent.trans: 减少异丙醇就意味着降低成本，及减少润版液的排放。

sent.orig: Or reduce cash flow and reduce debt ratio.
sent.trans: 或是减少现金流，降低负债比率。

sent.orig: Reduce the equipment shutdown risk, besides reduce the cost for purchase and inventory.
sent.trans: 在降低设备停机的风险的情况下，减少采购和库存成本。

sent.orig: Deputy channel mode compared to using sales model will help reduce circulation, reduce cost of sales.
sent.trans: 相比渠道代理模式，采用直销模式有利于减少产品流通环节，降低销售成本。
